name: WebMINNI
creators: Florian Schiel, Andreas Kipp, Thomas Kisler
description: The service WebMINNI calculates a phonetic segmentation and labeling based solely on the speech signal and without any text/phonological input. The service applies standard speech recognition techniques (HMM) combined with a phonotactic bi-gram model. The resulting segmentation/labeling is not of the same quality level as of the MAUS services (since the lexical/phonological information is missing). Nevertheless, the WebMINNI service may be useful for a coarse first labeling of a corpus that lacks any kind of text annotation.
